name: io.github.dimitar-grigorov/mcp-file-tools
title: MCP File Tools
description: Non-UTF-8/Unicode encoding: CP1251, CP1252, KOI8-R, ISO-8859 with auto-detection

tools.name: read_text_file
tools.description: Read file with encoding auto-detection, converts to UTF-8

tools.name: read_multiple_files
tools.description: Read multiple files concurrently with encoding support

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Write file with encoding conversion from UTF-8

tools.name: edit_file
tools.description: Replace text sequences with whitespace-flexible matching, returns diff

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List files and directories with glob pattern filtering

tools.name: tree
tools.description: Compact indented tree view (85% fewer tokens)

tools.name: directory_tree
tools.description: Recursive tree view as JSON (deprecated, use tree)

tools.name: search_files
tools.description: Recursively search for files matching glob patterns

tools.name: grep_text_files
tools.description: Regex search in file contents with encoding support

tools.name: detect_encoding
tools.description: Auto-detect file encoding with confidence score and BOM detection

tools.name: detect_line_endings
tools.description: Detect line ending style (crlf/lf/mixed) and find inconsistent lines

tools.name: convert_encoding
tools.description: Convert file encoding from source to target encoding

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Move or rename files and directories

tools.name: copy_file
tools.description: Copy a file (fails if destination exists)

tools.name: delete_file
tools.description: Delete a file (does not delete directories)

tools.name: list_allowed_directories
tools.description: Show directories the server can access
